thread.title: Virtually Explore Earth With New Device - Designed by InventHelp Client (NJD-948)
thread.title_full: Virtually Explore Earth With New Device - Designed by InventHelp Client (NJD-948)

author: Gia DelliGatti
title: Virtually Explore Earth With New Device - Designed by InventHelp Client (NJD-948)
text:
The Internet enables people to see what other places in the world look like, but an inventor from Staten Island, N.Y., has thought of a new and more dynamic way of doing this. "I wanted to offer a new way to explore areas of the globe for entertainment, education, business or travel purposes," he said. Versatile and producible in design variations, the I GLOBE is a device that enables a user to virtually explore any place on Earth in a convenient manner. It serves as entertainment and also helps with education, business and travel.
The original design was submitted to the New Jersey office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-NJD-948, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
